name.value: SelfMeasurements - XIS Server - Test Scenario 9.X - Serve heartrate Observation resources - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 9.X - Serve all heartrate Observation resources
Date that data and queries are expected to be relative to.
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-HeartRate1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation that contains valueQuantity.value = '63'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-HeartRate1-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 63 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '/min').exists()

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-HeartRate2)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation that contains valueQuantity.value = '96'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-HeartRate2-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 96 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '/min').exists()

description.value: Contains .comment 'Na traplopen'. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-HeartRate3)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation that contains valueQuantity.value = '72'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-HeartRate3-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 72 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '/min').exists()

description.value: Contains .comment 'Na traplopen'. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-HeartRate4)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation that contains valueQuantity.value = '65'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-HeartRate4-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 65 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '/min').exists()

description.value: Contains .comment 'Na traplopen'. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-HeartRate5)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation that contains valueQuantity.value = '64'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-HeartRate5-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 64 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = '/min').exists()

description.value: Contains .comment 'Na traplopen'. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s).
Confirm that the latest observation resource has the correct heartrate value
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 2 Observation resource(s).
Confirm that resources contain the correct values
Confirm that resources contain the correct values
